content.text:
# Draft:Korean Independence Army Songs

----
Korean Independence Army songs are a collection of songs and melodies that the Koreans fighting for Independence from Japan created. The most well-known ones are March of the KLA, Amnok River March, and Leaving Homeland. They were meant to inspire Koreans to join the Independence Army and advocate for Korean Independence.
List of the Independence Songs
* March of the KLA
* Amnok River March
* Leaving Homeland
* Tribute to the Heroes
* Liberation Army March
* Liberation Army 2nd Company Song
* Liberation Army 3rd Company Song
* Bravely Onwards March
* Song of the Women's Militia
Notable Composers and Lyricists of the Independence Army Songs
* Yun Hui-sun
* Kim Soon-nam
* Han Yu-han
References
